subject: ruckus
body:
Robin said that you'd think the guy would write 
something about that if he wanted people to read the article. She wasn't sure if she 
would like it or not. Howard thought that was the least of his addictions though. 
Artie said he's trying to become a better person.
Artie said that this girl's birthday is coming 
up.
Howard said he hopes that he is able to find out 
the truth.
